channel.title: Highlights on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Highlights on Reflections

item.title: GHC 2018 Hightlights
item.description: I am at the Houston IAH airport waiting to board the flight San Jose to go home after 3 days of inspiration, motivation, technology, friendship and pure awesomeness. Yes, I was at Grace Hopper Conference 2018, the world’s largest gathering of women technologists. I am writing this blog just to share my experiences and learnings from the event. Hope you enjoy reading it and get some inspiration. If you also attended GHC this year, I would love to know what your experience was.
